codePut:
update page_role
set version=version+1,
allow=nvl(:ALLOW,0),
role_name=:ROLE_NAME,
page_id=:PAGE_ID
where id=:id
codeGet:
select 
  id "id",
  to_char(allow) allow, /* cannot use int 0/1 for checkbox in AngularJS*/
  role_name,
  page_id
from page_role
where id = nvl(:id,id)
  and page_id=nvl(:page_id,page_id)
codePost:
insert into page_role
 (id, version,allow, role_name,page_id) 
values
( hibernate_sequence.nextval, 0, 
   nvl(:ALLOW,1),
  :ROLE_NAME,
  :PAGE_ID
)
